description: Retrieves information about the status and settings of the APNs VoIP channel for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationId
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the application. This identifier is displayed as the Project ID on the Amazon Pinpoint console.

nested_items.name: APNSVoipChannelResponse
nested_items.description: Provides information about the status and settings of the APNs (Apple Push Notification service) VoIP channel for an application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the application that the APNs VoIP channel applies to.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the APNs VoIP channel was enabled.

nested_items.name: DefaultAuthenticationMethod
nested_items.description: The default authentication method that Amazon Pinpoint uses to authenticate with APNs for this channel, key or certificate.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the APNs VoIP channel is enabled for the application.

nested_items.name: HasCredential
nested_items.description: (Not used) This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: HasTokenKey
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the APNs VoIP channel is configured to communicate with APNs by using APNs tokens. To provide an authentication key for APNs tokens, set the TokenKey property of the channel.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: (Deprecated) An identifier for the APNs VoIP channel. This property is retained only for backward compatibility.

nested_items.name: IsArchived
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the APNs VoIP channel is archived.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The user who last modified the APNs VoIP channel.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the APNs VoIP channel was last modified.

nested_items.name: Platform
nested_items.description: The type of messaging or notification platform for the channel. For the APNs VoIP channel, this value is APNS_VOIP.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The current version of the APNs VoIP channel.
